>
[Quick Disguise](/Feats.aspx?ID=5194) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You can set up a disguise in one-tenth the usual time (generally 1 minute). If you’re a master in Deception, you can create a full disguise and Impersonate as a 3-action activity. If you’re legendary, it takes a single action.

<title level="2">Quick Disguise leads to...</title>
[Costume Change](/Feats.aspx?ID=7640)
